div.ab: I announce and I arrange (a sacrifice) for the orderly juncture of the order of the beneficial mąϑra with the intercalations of the mąϑra, got by questioning for the sake of knowledge, from the upper places.

I announce and I arrange (the sacrifice) of the Ratu (Juncture) Bərəzaṇt, which (is made) of junctures of the order of the days, of the parts of the day, of the months, of the seasons, of the years, that are the junctures of the order, (and) of the juncture of the beneficial mąϑra with the intercalations of the mąϑra, got by questioning for the sake of knowledge, from the upper places.
Oh, orderly juncture of the order of the beneficial mąϑra with the intercalations of the mąϑra (got) by questioning for the sake of knowledge, from the upper places.

With this libation and this barsom I bring with the sacrifice the orderly juncture of the order of the beneficial mąϑra with the intercalations of the mąϑra, got by questioning for the sake of knowledge, from the upper places.

With this libation and this barsom I bring with the sacrifice all the orderly (beings) worthy of sacrifice. I bring with the sacrifice all the juntures of the order, in the middle of the juncture of the beneficial mąϑra with the intercalations of the mąϑra, got by questioning for the sake of knowledge, from the upper places; in the middle of the juncture, that is all the greatest junctures.

With the barsom that has been presented, accompanying the libation, at the juncture of the beneficial mąϑra with the intercalations of the mąϑra, got by questioning for the sake of knowledge, from the upper places, I bring with the sacrifice the (edible) offering as nourishment of Hauruuatāt and Amərətatāt, of the generous cow, for the satisfaction of Ahura Mazda, of the Aməṣ̌a Spəṇta; for the satisfaction of Sraōša, of Aṣ̌i's kin, who holds the reward, resilient, who increases the creation.

I bring with the sacrifice (these offerings) for the orderly juncture of the order of the beneficial mąϑra with the intercalations of the mąϑra, got by questioning for the sake of knowledge, from the upper places.

I bring with the sacrifice (these offerings) of the Ratu (Juncture) Bərəzaṇt, which (is made) of junctures of the order of the days, of the parts of the day, of the months, of the seasons, of the years, that are the junctures of the order,(and) of the juncture of the beneficial mąϑra with the intercalations of the mąϑra, got by questioning for the sake of knowledge, from the upper places.

I bring with the sacrifice (these offerings) for the orderly juncture of the order of the beneficial mąϑra with the intercalations of the mąϑra, got by questioning for the sake of knowledge, from the upper places.

I bring with the sacrifice (these offerings) of the Ratu (Juncture) Bərəzaṇt, which (is made) of junctures of the order of the days, of the parts of the day, of the months, of the seasons, of the years, that are the junctures of the order,(and) of the juncture of the beneficial mąϑra with the intercalations of the mąϑra, got by questioning for the sake of knowledge, from the upper places.
We worship the orderly the orderly juncture of the order of the beneficial mąϑra with the intercalations of the mąϑra, got by questioning for the sake of knowledge, from the upper places.

We worship all the orderly (beings) worthy of sacrifice. We worship all the junctures of the Order, in the middle of the juncture of the beneficial mąϑra with the intercalations of the mąϑra, got by questioning for the sake of knowledge, from the upper places, that is all the greatest junctures.

I place properly (these offerings) of the orderly juncture of the order of the beneficial mąϑra with the intercalations of the mąϑra, got by questioning for the sake of knowledge, from the upper places.

I place properly (these offerings) of the Ratu (Juncture) Bərəzaṇt, which (is made) of junctures of the Order of the days, of the parts of the day, of the months, of the seasons, of the years, that are the junctures of the Order, (and) of the juncture of the beneficial mąϑra with the intercalations of the mąϑra, got by questioning for the sake of knowledge, from the upper places.
